articles.description: Shraddha Kapoor's bikini looks from the trailer of Tu Jhoothi Main Makkar left everyone in awe! From bold colours to floral prints, the Bollywood diva donned a variety of styles. Here's a look at some of her best bikini looks!
articles.content: Tu Jhoothi Main Makkaar is an upcoming romantic comedy that stars Shraddha Kapoor and Ranbir Kapoor. Set to release in March 2023, the film has a number of beach scenes!
